Are there duplicate lines in the clownfish database?
```{r}
source("../genomics/scripts/gen_helpers.R")

leyte <- read_db("Leyte")

fish <- leyte %>% 
  tbl("clownfish") %>% 
  collect()

# 5434 rows

fish <- fish %>% 
  distinct()

# 5361 rows
```
